SESSION_STRING.description: Put value None or Pyrogram string optional for 4GB support.

USER_CHAT.description: User Chat ID or username where logs or messages are sent

ADMIN.description: Add your User ID(s). If multiple, use space to split

DB_URL.description: Your MongoDB URL obtained from mongodb.com

MAX_SPACE.description: Maximum space allowed for a user

SHORTEN_KEY.description: Domain API, domain API, domain API
